response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our flagship product, which I believe would significantly benefit your business operations. Given its value and the impact it could have on your projects, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $13,000. This represents a substantial saving compared to the market value of $15,000, while still ensuring a fair return for us. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success. Please let me know if you need any further information or have questions about the product.", "product_price": 13000}
